markdown.markdown:
## {background-image="../fig/geospatial_commission.png" background-size="contain"} ## :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} [![](../fig/nldp_report.png)](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/finding-common-ground-integrating-data-science-and-innovation-for-better-use-of-land) ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ::: {.fragment} [![](../fig/nldp_pilot.png)](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/finding-common-ground-integrating-data-science-and-innovation-for-better-use-of-land/finding-common-ground-integrating-data-science-and-innovation-for-better-use-of-land#section-1-the-land-economy) ::: ::: :::: # Context :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width='40%'} [![](fig/emma_warneford.png)](https://twitter.com/GeospatialC/status/1694606749091693048) ::: ::: {.column width='60%'} - Newcastle City Council - Local Spatial Plan - Policy needs, challenges ::: :::: # Goals - Quantify competing aspects of land use in a given urban environment through key indicators (*baseline*) - Build bespoke scenarios under changes that affect the distribution of such land use (*scenarios*) - Present outputs in an interactive visualisation tool # Baseline ## Indicators ::: {layout-nrow=2} ![Air Quality](fig/air_pollution.png){width=200} ![House Prices](fig/house_prices.png){width=200} ![Job Acessibility](fig/job_accessibility.png){width=200} ![Green Space Accessibility](fig/greenspace_accessibility.png){width=200} ::: ## Land Use - Spatial Signatures :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="60%"} *Characterisation of space based on form and function designed to understand urban environments* [`UrbanGrammarAI.xyz`](https://urbangrammarai.xyz) ::: ::: {.column width="40%"} [![](fig/spatial_signatures.png)](https://urbangrammarai.xyz/story) ::: :::: ## Land Use <--> Indicators `Accessibility scores` - Employment - Green space `Predictive models` - Air quality - House prices # *What if* scenarios ## :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width='60%'} > Exploring the effect of changing the baseline land use on the indicators of interest ### Baseline The world as it is ### Scenarios The world as it _could_ be ::: ::: {.column width='40%'} ![](fig/scenario.png) ::: :::: ## Co-produced scenarios - Residential development - Low density (**1**) - Mid-density compact (**2**) - Inner-city densification (**3**) - Brownfield redevelopment (**4**, **5**) - Dense neighborhoods (**4**) - Parks (**5**) - Combinations (**6**, **7**) # Interactive tool ## {background-image="../fig/web_tool.png" background-size="contain"} ## Demo [`[URL]`](https://urban-analytics-technology-platform.github.io/demoland-web/v1.0/) {.center} ## Play time - Activity I - `[10min]` Explore the set scenarios on your own - `[10min]` Think of a new scenario you would like to explore - Why is it relevant? - What changes would it contain? - What effects would you expect? ## Play time - Activity II New version! [`[URL]`](https://urban-analytics-technology-platform.github.io/demoland-web/) - `[15min]` Implement your scenario (use the [spatial signature descriptions](https://urbangrammarai.xyz/story/#ss) for help - `[10min]` Explore the changes when compared to the baseline - Are they in line with your expectations? - What is unexpected? - Why do you think this is? ## "Behind the scenes..." Urban Data Science and all that jazz... - Policy relevance - Data, data, data - Models, spatial analysis, machine learning - Co-production # {background-image="../fig/demoland_turing.png" background-size="contain"} #
These slides are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Newcastle City Council - Local Spatial Plan - Policy needs, challenges ::: :::: # Goals - Quantify competing aspects of land use in a given urban environment through key indicators (*baseline*) - Build bespoke scenarios under changes that affect the distribution of such land use (*scenarios*) - Activity II New version! [`[URL]`](https://urban-analytics-technology-platform.github.io/demoland-web/) - `[15min]` Implement your scenario (use the [spatial signature descriptions](https://urbangrammarai.xyz/story/#ss) for help - `[10min]` Explore the changes when compared to the baseline - Are they in line with your expectations? - What is unexpected? - Why do you think this is? ## "Behind the scenes..." Urban Data Science and all that jazz... - Policy relevance - Data, data, data - Models, spatial analysis, machine learning - Co-production # {background-image="../fig/demoland_turing.png" background-size="contain"} #
